channel.title: Server looking for a no-ip hoster
channel.description:
My server, is looking for a no-ip hoster. The server must be up 20/7 atleast, and has to hold 30 people with no lag at all.
(I am also looking for a shop coder, they will recieve Head Moderator(admin))[br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2007, 04:59:40 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Server looking for a no-ip hoster
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Thanks, but I tried. I am thinking of still getting a hoster though.

Read full topic
item.source: Server looking for a no-ip hoster

item.title: Server looking for a no-ip hoster
item.dc:creator: @bed240 bed240
item.description:
@bed240 wrote:

you tried hosting yourself thru hamachi?
i couldnt port forward cause didnt no my router pass so i used hamachi you get good number of people coming on your server aswel

ok it may be bit mre lagy than no-ip but just a thought

Read full topic
